data.message: I'm a big fan too Christmas you say rejoice rejoice for I want to play I know he's busy for all the public write so how about something cool like I show you on paper oh .. God prevails I just told my wife that I loved her for stopping pills and I miss her.. God prevails in everything you wait in see join in the fun or is God to gay for me.. Oh hell what can I say that shit oh yep I did and I want to cover all of it from the words that I type how can I go wrong here's a chance please come take care of my song.. God prevails over everything and everyone I see you when I see my wife you got her through hard times and you can't go wrong she just didn't love herself like did cry relax relax don't sheaf the best of yet to come I'm not perfect but nor will I.., God is good God is great what food we just ate now please please follow me on my phone for I just wrapped this whole thing up in let's say uh how long did it take to read this well about an hour for I just sent this about an hour yep I'm not sure but is this man real God prevails in many ways I'm going to let you use my wife uh huh I don't get it use... God is prevailing view of me yep you don't say poetry can't shoot me out relax relax where did you come from I came from above and I want to play a game try this on your ears for an hour and let me sing in the shower uh that makes no sense at all we need good kids that is all.., God is prevailing
